x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: In today’s digital age, people often struggle to stay focused and manage their time effectively. There’s a need for a simple, intelligent system that helps users track how they spend their time and encourages mindful focus throughout the day.

x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • Service Portal – for user registration, mode selection, and time usage reports
  • Record Producer – to collect activity logs and user preferences
  • Flow Designer – to automate notifications and mode-based tracking intervals
  • Virtual Agent – for productivity tips, reminders, and user engagement
  • Notification Engine – to send prompts based on selected mode
  • Performance Analytics – to visualize time usage trends and productivity scores
  • Survey Management – for user feedback and improvement suggestions
  • Now Mobile (optional) – for mobile tracking and real-time logging

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Notification scheduling based on user-selected mode and intervals
  • Secure data handling for activity logs and personal usage patterns
  • Integration with mobile OS APIs for app usage tracking (optional)
  • AI-based analysis for personalized productivity insights
  • Sleep mode scheduling and auto-disable logic

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Ensuring consistent user engagement and logging
  • Managing notification fatigue and user preferences
  • Accurately categorizing activities as productive or non-productive
  • Providing meaningful insights without overwhelming the user
  • Scaling the platform for diverse user routines and time zones
